name: Ghost Boar
movement: 40 feet walking speed allows quick approach
description: The Ghost Boar has a spectral appearance that blends physical might with ghostly abilities, featuring tusks that can deliver strong melee attacks.
memorable: It can phase through objects and is extremely resilient due to its Relentless ability.
goals: Typically engages in combat, using its physical strength to overpower opponents.
relations: May be associated with undead or spectral creatures in the environment.
environment: Often found in haunted forests or battlefields.
strengths: High Strength score for powerful melee attacks and resilience against being knocked out.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma result in ineffective combat interactions.
attacks: Can deliver tusk attacks with significant slashing damage, and has a retaliatory strike with Tusk Swipe.
most_powerful_ability: Incorporeal Jaunt allows it to move through creatures and obstacles.
additional_information: Charge ability increases damage and can knock targets prone
Relentless ability keeps it in the fight when damaged
Tusk Swipe enables reaction attacks against melee attackers
test_queries: spectral creature that charges at enemies
powerful ghost boar in haunted forests
boar that can phase through obstacles
resilient creature that retaliates with tusks
